languages.text: Изучил{mf||а} душу рабочего своим нечестивым взором, чтобы отыскать следы скверны.
Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption.
languages.original_text: Изучил{mf||а} душу рабочего своим нечестивым взором, чтобы отыскать следы скверны.

traits.locale_text: "Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption."
"Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption."
"Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption."
"Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption."

languages.text: 人間の作業員の魂を邪悪な目で見透かし、穢れの痕跡を探った
languages.original_text: Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption.

traits.locale_text: 「人間の作業員の魂を邪悪な目で見透かし、穢れの痕跡を探った」

languages.text: Escrutaste el alma del trabajador con una mirada impía buscando indicios de corrupción.
languages.original_text: Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption.

traits.locale_text: «Escrutaste el alma del trabajador con una mirada impía buscando indicios de corrupción».

languages.text: 你以邪恶的目光检查那位工人的灵魂，寻找腐化的痕迹。
languages.original_text: Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption.

traits.locale_text: “你以邪恶的目光检查那位工人的灵魂，寻找腐化的痕迹。”

languages.text: Seele des Arbeiters mit einem unheiligen Blick untersucht, um Spuren von Verderbnis zu erkennen.
languages.original_text: Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption.

traits.locale_text: "Seele des Arbeiters mit einem unheiligen Blick untersucht, um Spuren von Verderbnis zu erkennen."

languages.text: Vous avez examiné l'âme de l'ouvrier d'un regard impie afin d'y chercher des traces de corruption.
languages.original_text: Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption.

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez examiné l'âme de l'ouvrier d'un regard impie afin d'y chercher des traces de corruption. »

languages.text: İşçinin ruhunu, yozlaşma izi aramak için uğursuz bir bakışla inceledi.
languages.original_text: Examined the worker's soul with an unholy gaze to seek out traces of corruption.

traits.locale_text: "İşçinin ruhunu, yozlaşma izi aramak için uğursuz bir bakışla inceledi."
